questions.title: 眼不见心不烦。
questions.answer: Out of sight and out of mind.

questions.title: 你的儿子在事故中受伤了。
他花了四个小时复习功课。
questions.answer: He spent four hours going over his lessons.

questions.title: 我肯定她会帮你的。
questions.answer: I'm sure she will help you.

questions.title: 他看过我昨天买的书了。
questions.answer: He read the book I got yesterday.

answer.en: Ought he go to the airport now?

title: ——你在想什么啊？
——我在想我为什么不是有钱人。
——多做实事吧。

answer.en: I'm thinking why I am not a rich man.

title: ——我们研究所的所有科研人员都不能确定哪个方案可以被实施。
——这确实是一个难题。

answer.en: All research scientists in our institute are not sure which project canbe used.
It is really a difficult problem.
